articles.description: The second season of the UK spin-off has been a huge hit. Ahead of the final, Ellie Diamond, Lawrence Chaney, Tayce and Bimini Bon Boulash spill the beans
articles.content: On Thursday nights, drag queen Tayce settles in to watch RuPauls Drag Race UK with his housemates. We sit around, get some food, watch the thing, then have a couple of bevs after, he says, talking fr… [+19771 chars]

articles.content:
NIKKI Grahame is battling anorexia and her condition has "worsened" in recent months.
The 38-year-old star is in a "very bad way" and her Big Brother pal Rylan Clark-Neal has tweeted his fans asking… [+3314 chars]

articles.title: Gayle King claims Meghan Markle has ‘plenty of receipts’ to back up racism allegations - The Independent
articles.description: Prince William denied racism allegations Thursday, telling reporter: ‘We are very much not a racist family’
